name: Devil in the Pines
description: An Appalachian man makes a desperate final move to save his sick daughter's life. But after unknowingly stepping onto cursed land, he now also finds himself in a fight to save his own.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 610 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 780 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
